a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: International tourist departures per 1,000 people vs. GDP per capita,
Number of trips by people who travel abroad and stay overnight. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost
Data source: United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO, 2023) and World Bank (2020)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
